name: Atakilt Wat - Ethiopian Cabbage Potato Carrots. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe
description: Atakilt Wat - Ethiopian Cabbage Potato Carrots. Easy spiced side full of amazing flavor. free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast, nut, gluten, grain.

video.name: Atakilt Wat - Ethiopian Cabbage Potato Carrots 1 Pot | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Ethiopian Cabbage Potatoes and Carrots. Atakilt Wat. 1 Pot , 30 Mins
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2014/07/atakilt-wat-ethiopian-cabbage-potato.html

Atakilt Wat/ Atkilt wot is a Ethiopian cabbage dish. The traditional recipe may or may not use some niter kibeh which is butter/ghee slow-infused with whole spices like cardamom, cinnamon, fenugreek, cloves, ginger, garlic etc. by cooking everything on low heat for hours. You can make niter qibe/ kibeh with coconut or olive oil(see my Second book Everyday Kitchen for a recipe) and use about a Tbsp of the Spiced oil in this recipe instead of all the spices and oil. 
Since I don't usually have the infused oil, I sometimes add the spices directly to infuse the oil while cooking (Indian style) for my interpretation of this delicious Atakilt Wat. Omit the spices to preference. Serve with Ethiopian flat breads or other flat breads and lentil stews. Easy and So Flavorful!

More Ethiopian Inspired Recipes including Berbere Spiced Jackfruit, Kik Alicha and more here: https://www.veganricha.com/?s=ethiopian

recipeIngredient: 2 tsp olive oil or vegan butter (divided)
a generous dash of black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, add 1 tsp oil and heat at medium-low. Once hot, Add garlic, ginger, chili, and onion. Mix, cook for 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large skillet, add 1 tsp oil and heat at medium-low. Once hot, Add garlic, ginger, chili, and onion. Mix, cook for 4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cumin, turmeric, fenugreek seeds, cardamom, cinnamon, cloves and black pepper. Mix and cook for 3 minutes to infuse the oil and to continue cooking the onion to golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cumin, turmeric, fenugreek seeds, cardamom, cinnamon, cloves and black pepper. Mix and cook for 3 minutes to infuse the oil and to continue cooking the onion to golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the carrots, potato and mix well. Add cabbage and 1/4 tsp salt. Mix well, cover and cook for 15 minutes. Stir once in between.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the carrots, potato and mix well. Add cabbage and 1/4 tsp salt. Mix well, cover and cook for 15 minutes. Stir once in between.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/4 tsp or more salt, and 1 tsp olive oil. Mix in. Deglaze at this time with water if needed Cover and Cook for another 15 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. *
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1/4 tsp or more salt, and 1 tsp olive oil. Mix in. Deglaze at this time with water if needed Cover and Cook for another 15 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. *

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with Ethiopian flat bread Injera and lentil wat, ethiopian greens(gomen wat)
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with Ethiopian flat bread Injera and lentil wat, ethiopian greens(gomen wat)
